abstract: ABC’s Democratic debate coverage, which lasted from 8 to 10 p.m. and averaged 10.7 million viewers, led all of its prime time competitors during its first hour but trailed far behind Fox’s “American Idol” (22.7 million) and CBS’s “Criminal Minds” (12.9 million) during the 9 p.m. time slot.
lead_paragraph: ABC’s Democratic debate coverage, which lasted from 8 to 10 p.m. and averaged 10.7 million viewers, led all of its prime time competitors during its first hour but trailed far behind Fox’s “American Idol” (22.7 million) and CBS’s “Criminal Minds” (12.9 million) during the 9 p.m. time slot.
